nodes.title: Understand Git basics
nodes.desc: Learn the fundamental concepts of Git, including repositories, branches, and commits. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-About-Version-Control)

nodes.title: Install Git
nodes.desc: Download and install Git on your computer to start using it. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/downloads)

nodes.title: Understand Git submodules
nodes.desc: Learn how to use submodules to manage dependencies in your project. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Submodules)

nodes.title: Learn Git bisect
nodes.desc: Understand how to use Git bisect to find bugs in your code. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Debugging-with-Git)

nodes.title: Use Git tags
nodes.desc: Learn how to use tags to mark releases or milestones in your project. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Basics-Tagging)

nodes.title: Understand Git stash
nodes.desc: Learn how to use the stash to temporarily store changes. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Stashing-and-Cleaning)

nodes.title: Learn Git cherry-picking
nodes.desc: Understand how to apply specific commits from one branch to another. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Reset-Checking-Out-and-Resetting)

nodes.title: Use Git rebase
nodes.desc: Learn how to rebase your commits to maintain a linear history. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Branching-Rebasing)

nodes.title: Understand Git reflog
nodes.desc: Learn how to use the reflog to recover lost commits. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Reset-Checking-Out-and-Resetting)

nodes.title: Learn Git filter-branch
nodes.desc: Understand how to rewrite your commit history. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Rewriting-History)

nodes.title: Create a repository
nodes.desc: Initialize a new Git repository to store your project files. [github](https://help.github.com/en/articles/create-a-repo)

nodes.title: Understand Git workflow
nodes.desc: Learn the typical workflow of Git, including creating branches, making changes, and merging. [atlassian](https://www.atlassian.com/git/tutorials/comparing-workflows)

nodes.title: Learn Git commands
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with common Git commands, such as `git add`, `git commit`, and `git push`. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/docs)

nodes.title: Understand Git branching
nodes.desc: Learn how to create and manage branches in Git to work on different features or versions. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Branching-Branches-in-a-Nutshell)

nodes.title: Learn Git merging
nodes.desc: Understand how to merge changes from one branch to another. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Branching-Basic-Branching-and-Merging)

nodes.title: Understand Git remote
nodes.desc: Learn how to work with remote repositories, including cloning and pushing changes. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Basics-Working-with-Remotes)

nodes.title: Use Git GUI tools
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with graphical user interface tools for Git, such as GitKraken or Sourcetree. [gitkraken](https://www.gitkraken.com/)

nodes.title: Use Git hooks
nodes.desc: Learn how to use Git hooks to automate tasks and enforce coding standards. [git-scm](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Customizing-Git-Git-Hooks)
